ygData.subject: Re: Help on Races
ygData.msgSnippet: Another pro:  all the enchant metal spells are in that city. Meer (gnome enchanter) ... From: Eain Bankins  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Another pro: all the enchant metal spells are in that city.

Meer (gnome enchanter)
----- Original Message -----
From: Eain Bankins <eain@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 6:40 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Help on Races


> From: Eain Bankins <eain@...>
>
>
> I play a dark elf.
>
> Pros: ULTRAVISION. I love it, it's so awesome... Good stats, high
> int, can wear both small and medium, the look cool.
>
> Cons: Everyone hates them, but being an enchanter, at 4th level you
> start getting the humanoid illusion spells, so that's not much of a
> problem. Nerriak is one of the most confusing cities EVER. And
> Nektulos Forest, right outside Nerriak, is also very confusing, easy to
> get lost in there...
>
> I still wouldn't change it, though. I've learned the city, and the
> forest (I'm 9th level), and I can travel anywhere with the illusion
> spells.
>
> E
> --
> "There is no spoon."
>
> -The Matrix
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> To unsubscribe from this mailing list, or to change your subscription
> to digest, go to the ONElist web site, at http://www.onelist.com and
> select the Member Center link from the menu bar on the left.
>
